definitions.definition: acceptance of the truth or existence of something.
examples: there was no acknowledgment of the family's trauma
synonyms: confession "acknowledgment of the need to take new initiatives"

definitions.definition: the action of expressing or displaying gratitude or appreciation for something.
examples: he received an award in acknowledgment of his work
synonyms: recognition "she left without a word of acknowledgment"

definitions.definition: the action of showing that one has noticed someone or something.
examples: he touched his hat in acknowledgment of the salute

definitions.definition: a letter confirming receipt of something.
examples: I received an acknowledgment of my application

definitions.definition: an author's or publisher's statement of indebtedness to others, typically one printed at the beginning of a book.
